text: Good! Can bump up all that work! You got a mentor or anyone there to help you out? I'm not sure if we do or not tbh! I've never heard of one, but I know we sometimes pick up a small amount of overflow from bigger companies towards deadlines, so maybe we've done that a few times?

Yeah it could’ve been that! Can’t remember where I heard or read something like that(: 

Yes I think I will get a mentor in the company but not yet as I only just started!(: but yes I can keep working and grow inside of the company!(:

Oh that's good! You've probably been told by loads of people, but try to talk to as many people as possible in the department you want to get in to. And even if they're not your mentor, in as least bugging way as possible, try to get them to view your work and critique it. You've probably been told that a lot, but it definitely helps!
